metadata.title: CVE-2015-3644 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Stunnel 5.00 through 5.13, when using the redirect option, does notredirect client connections to the expected server after the initialconnection, which allows remote attackers to bypass authentication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3644` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

stunnel4 - 3:5.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: stunnel4 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:5.18-1').
